page.title: 17TRANSPORT:BAD'HAM/DENN'TON
page.content: 80% of households have at least 1 car & 37% have additional cars. Twice as many households in Dennington compared to Badingham have no car transport & more households in Badingham have 2 cars per household. Dennington has a public bus service to Ipswich via Framlingham, Wickham Market & Woodbridge; 3 times daily Monday to Friday inclusive & twice on Saturday. Badingham has a coach service organised by its Community Council for visits to Ipswich via Framlingham once a month and to Framlingham monthly. 6% of Badingham households use the coach regularly & slightly more than twice that % use it occasionally. Almost half the households travel by train sometimes but only 2% use the train often. The nearest station is Saxmundham. There is a taxi service in Dennington.
